mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xiangmu_name as xiangmuName ,a.xiangmu_photo as xiangmuPhoto ,a.xiangmu_types as xiangmuTypes ,a.xiangmu_address as xiangmuAddress ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xiangmu_content as xiangmuContent ,a.xiangmu_yesno_types as xiangmuYesnoTypes ,a.xiangmu_yesno_text as xiangmuYesnoText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM xiangmu a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.xiangmu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuName},'%')
and a.xiangmu_types = #{params.xiangmuTypes}
and a.xiangmu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuAddress},'%')
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xiangmu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuContent},'%')
and a.xiangmu_yesno_types = #{params.xiangmuYesnoTypes}
and a.xiangmu_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
